name: The Botanist (itch) (corporat, ellemmax)
description:
It's your first research project as a botanist. Your job is simple: lift plant samples from the specimen tray and catalog your findings. Just don't overthink.

Credit where credit is due:

  • Cover image "Pulling Buffelgrass" is provided under CC BY 2.0 by Desert LCC.
  • Game image "Cenchrus_ciliaris_spikelets2" is provided under CC BY 2.0 by Harry Rose.
  • Game image "Woolly desert-marigold" is provided under CC BY 2.0 by Andrey Zharkikh.
